title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 64 - Nursing
content:

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207, 6503[3], 6504, 6506, 6507, 6509[a], 6527[6], 6807[3], 6902, 6909[4], [5], 6910

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 64.1 - Professional study of nursing
